author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Winning Tandem is Launching a New Book – “Tempered Through Trials” | User | times-online.com
text: Life's journey is often marked by challenges and obstacles that can leave us feeling overwhelmed and alone. From personal setbacks to professional hurdles, we all face moments of struggle that test our resolve and resilience. We've all been there. Whether it's facing rejection, battling self-doubt, or navigating the complexities of relationships, life has a way of throwing us curve balls when we least expect it. These can leave us feeling isolated, frustrated, and unsure of how to move forward. What if there was a secret weapon that could turn our challenges into pathways to success? Two friends Rizah Valdez and her business partner, Milagros Sinon (better known as the Winning Tandem) were encouraged by Life on Fire to write a book. Their upcoming book titled "Tempered Through Trials" will take readers on a relatable journey to transformation and provide empowering keys to overcome. In this book, you’ll discover God’s refining process, comparing it to the purification of metals through fire. Just as metals are purified and strengthened by fire, we are refined through trials and challenges. Winning Tandem. believe in the power of partnership to overcome and achieve remarkable success. They believe in being a part of a community that works together as steadfast allies, supporting each other through every twist and turn on the road to success. Dive in, explore, and discover how Winning Tandem can help you reach new heights. Watch out for "Tempered Through Trials" by visiting their website at https://www.winningtandem.com/ . About Winning Tandem Winning Tandem — Rizah Valdez and her business partner Milagros Sinon, are self-publishing a book called “Tempered Through Trials”. Media Contact Company Name: Winning Tandem Contact Person: Riz and Miles, the "Winning Tandem" Email: Send Email Phone: +1602-428-4767 Country: United States Website: https://www.winningtandem.com/
